= Descriptive Vs. Normal Appreaches =

| Descriptive | Normative |       |
|             | Non-moral | Moral |
|             |           |       |

*Descriptive* - Report or describ what _is_ the case
*Normative* - Prescribe what _ought_ to be the case
*Non-Moral* - Prescribe or evaluate in matters involving standards such as arts and sports. (e.g. criteria for a good painting)
*Moral* - Prescrive or evaluate in matters having to do with fairness and Obligation (e.g. criteria for just and unjust action and polices)
